channel.title: Need help!
channel.description:
Okay, it says my server is offline when i try and post onto moparscape. i have changed the EGUI.JAVA, the Client.java, and everything i need to change, the "server" in the source says Client required: 0 , "world ID: 1", and "port: 43594" any ideas??
ive portforwarded, linksys router, changed to UDP i believe.

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Turn your server on.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 19, 2009, 11:12:20 am[/size][hr]P.S Linksys routers have build in firewalls. Make sure your router’s firewall is turned off. Same for your system’s firewall, either add an exception, or turn it off to test if that is the case.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @iamminesmith iamminesmith
item.description:
@iamminesmith wrote:

it said that the connection timed out, so what do i do?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Are you absolutely sure that port 43594 is open? Double check…
Go here: http://www.canyouseeme.org/ it will tell you if its open or not.

You are posting your external ip I hope?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @iamminesmith iamminesmith
item.description:
@iamminesmith wrote:

i forgot to mention that i already did, sorry

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Got a router? If so, you’ll have to port forward.
